item.title: Privacy Policy
item.author: info@code-space.dev (Yuna Morgenstern)
item.description: “Privacy Policy for Code Space Introduction This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, process, and share your information when you use our webpage “Code Space”. It also explains your rights with respect to your information and how to exercise those rights. Information Collection and Use Code Space does not collect or store any personal information from its users. The webpage is designed to generate random images and does not require any personal information to be entered by the user.
